Header.title: Innovative Energy for a Greener Tomorrow!
Header.paragraph: From advanced technology to sustainable practices, we provide end-to-end energy solutions that empower growth and protect the planet.

About.paragraph: Magnox Energy Solutions LLP is dedicated to streamlining renewable energy projects with our extensive industry network and in-depth regulatory knowledge. We pride ourselves on accelerating approval processes, making us a leading choice for businesses requiring fast and reliable regulatory solutions.
Why: End-to-End EPC Solutions for Transmission Lines
Specialized Power Evacuation for Solar & Wind Projects
Why2: Proven Track Record in Utility-Scale Projects
One-Stop Solution for SEM & Open Access Services

Services.name: Consultancy
Services.text: Need expert advice on your electrical projects? Look no further. At Green En Solutions, we provide consultancy services for a wide range of projects, from residential house wiring to high-voltage transmission and substations. Our experienced team ensures that every project is carefully planned and executed to meet the highest standards.

Services.name: Renewable Energy
Services.text: Renewable energy is at the heart of what we do. We handle every aspect of renewable energy projects, from initial feasibility studies to final commissioning. We offer a variety of renewable energy solutions, each designed to harness the power of different technologies to meet your specific needs.

Services.name: Control Panels
Services.text: We specialize in control panels, providing everything from design and supply to installation, testing, and commissioning. Our dedicated team also offers ongoing maintenance to ensure your control panels operate efficiently and reliably.

Services.name: SEM & OA Services
Services.text: Navigating the requirements for Special Energy Meters (SEM) and Open Access (OA) services can be complex, but we're here to help. We provide a seamless, one-stop solution for companies needing SEM and OA services, handling everything from application to approval.

Services.name: Industrial Electrical Turnkey Projects
Services.text: Our expertise extends to comprehensive industrial electrical turnkey projects. We provide end-to-end solutions, ensuring efficiency, safety, and reliability every step of the way.

EnergySolutions.title: Solar Energy Solutions
EnergySolutions.subtitle: High-Performance Photovoltaic Systems
EnergySolutions.description: We design and deliver high-performance solar energy systems that make sustainable power accessible to everyone ‚Äî from rural households to large-scale industries. Our products are built using advanced photovoltaic technology, engineered for efficiency even in low-light conditions.
products: Solar Panels & Modules: High-efficiency mono and polycrystalline panels for all energy needs
Inverters & Controllers: Smart inverters with real-time monitoring and automatic fault detection
Battery Storage Systems: Long-lasting lithium and hybrid batteries for uninterrupted power
Solar Water Heaters & Streetlights: Energy-efficient and weather-resistant products for daily use
EnergySolutions.benefits: Reduced carbon footprint, long lifespan, low maintenance, and significant energy savings over time.
specifications: Panel Efficiency: Up to 22.5% conversion rate
caseStudies: Rural Electrification Project: 500 households powered in Maharashtra
Industrial Installation: 2MW rooftop system for textile factory
Smart City Initiative: 1000+ solar streetlights deployed

EnergySolutions.title: Wind Energy Systems
EnergySolutions.subtitle: Reliable Wind Power Solutions
EnergySolutions.description: We provide durable and reliable wind turbines that convert natural wind into consistent power. Our wind systems are adaptable for coastal, industrial, and remote areas, ensuring energy access anywhere nature allows.
EnergySolutions.benefits: Minimal maintenance, silent operation, zero emissions, and long-term cost efficiency.
caseStudies: Coastal Installation: 50kW turbine powering fishing village
Industrial Hybrid System: Solar-wind combination for factory
Remote Telecom Tower: Reliable power for connectivity

EnergySolutions.title: Hydro Energy Equipment
EnergySolutions.subtitle: Clean Hydroelectric Power Systems
EnergySolutions.description: Our hydro solutions leverage flowing water to create clean and dependable electricity. With precision-engineered components and smart control systems, we bring hydropower to even the most challenging terrains.
EnergySolutions.benefits: Continuous energy generation, environmentally friendly, and ideal for off-grid communities and rural electrification.
caseStudies: Agricultural Irrigation: Water pumping and power generation
Eco-Resort: Off-grid luxury powered by stream

EnergySolutions.title: Biogas Energy Units
EnergySolutions.subtitle: Organic Waste to Clean Energy Conversion
EnergySolutions.description: Our biogas systems transform organic waste into clean, renewable fuel ‚Äî turning an environmental challenge into a sustainable opportunity. Designed for both small-scale and commercial applications, these units help reduce landfill waste while generating usable energy.
products: Domestic Biogas Kits: Compact units for households and farms
Commercial Digesters: Industrial-grade systems for large-scale waste processing
Waste-to-Energy Plants: Integrated setups for municipalities and agro-industries
EnergySolutions.benefits: Reduces methane emissions, provides dual benefits of energy and fertilizer, promotes circular economy models, and supports sustainable agriculture.
specifications: Gas Production: 2-4 m¬≥ per day for domestic units
Feedstock: Kitchen waste, animal dung, agricultural residues
caseStudies: Dairy Farm Project: 50% reduction in energy costs
Municipal Waste Management: 10-ton daily processing capacity

EnergySolutions.title: Mining Energy Solutions
EnergySolutions.subtitle: Robust Power Systems for Mining Operations
EnergySolutions.description: We provide specialized energy solutions designed for the demanding requirements of mining operations. Our systems deliver reliable, high-capacity power to remote mining sites, ensuring continuous operation of heavy machinery and processing equipment in harsh environments.
products: High-Capacity Generators: Diesel and hybrid generators rated from 500kW to 5MW for continuous mining operations
Mobile Power Units: Transportable energy systems for exploration and temporary mining sites
Grid-Tied Systems: Integration with local power grids for cost-effective energy supply
Backup Power Solutions: Uninterruptible power systems for critical mining equipment and safety systems
EnergySolutions.benefits: Reliable power in remote locations, reduced operational costs, enhanced safety systems, scalable solutions for different mining phases, and minimal environmental impact.
specifications: Fuel Efficiency: Up to 35% better than standard generators
Operating Altitude: Up to 4000m above sea level
Environmental: IP65 rated for dust and water protection
caseStudies: Coal Mining Complex: 3MW hybrid system powering extraction equipment
Gold Mine Operation: Remote power solution for 24/7 processing plant
Iron Ore Project: Grid integration reducing energy costs by 40%

Features.title: Power Evacuation Mastery
Features.text: We specialize in efficient power evacuation for Solar and Wind projects, with expertise in Special Energy Metering at both Generation and Plant End.

Features.title: EPC Project
Features.text: Our robust capabilities extend to transmission line EPC projects, from Generation End to Substation End, including bay design and comprehensive EPC services.

Features.title: Right-of-Way Expertise
Features.text: We're experts at handling the complex process of securing land and permissions needed for energy projects. This makes Green En a reliable choice for managing power evacuation in renewable energy.

Features.title: Utility-Scale Projects
Features.text: From the ground up, we design, build, and manage extensive grid-scale solar, wind, and hybrid projects across India. Our projects provide renewable energy to both state and central government utilities under long-term contracts, offering up to 25 years of stability and reliability.
